entry.title: [Pre-BIP Discussion] Bitcoin Node Repository Consensus-Policy Separation
entry.summary: In a recent exchange on the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, a proposal was put forward by Juan Aleman regarding the creation of a new resource or project within the community. Matt Corallo responded to this suggestion with encouragement, highlighting the open and permissionless nature of contributions in this area. He emphasized that if Aleman believes the proposed initiative would be valuable, he should not hesitate to proceed with its development. Corallo's response underlines a core principle within the Bitcoin development ecosystem: individuals are empowered to take action and contribute without the need for explicit approval from others. This interaction serves as a reminder of the decentralized and collaborative spirit that drives innovation and progress in the Bitcoin community.
